attributes.title: bee movie
attributes.review: Barry B. Benson is a graduate bee fresh out of college who is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a rare trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans are mass consumers of honey and decides to sue the human race for stealing bees' honey.
Absolutely horrible, was not helpful at all, my phone started glitching because of this app,  0/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: nasty.
attributes.review: took SO long to download worse way to start off a campaign.. just wanted to support until it took 2 days to download.. would NEVER recommend.

attributes.review: This app made my phone crash multiple times! It also drains my battery a lot. This makes me very angry because I cannot text my mom to pick me up from pre-school. I am LIVID.
